select * from db.express
AND expressNo LIKE "%"#{expressNo}"%"
AND expressCompany LIKE "%"#{expressCompany}"%"
AND productLink LIKE "%"#{productLink}"%"
AND senderTel LIKE "%"#{senderTel}"%"
AND recipientTel LIKE "%"#{recipientTel}"%"
AND senderName LIKE "%"#{senderName}"%"
AND recipientName LIKE "%"#{recipientName}"%"
AND senderAddress LIKE "%"#{senderAddress}"%"
AND recipientAddress LIKE "%"#{recipientAddress}"%"
And status=#{status}

select distinct (e.expressNo), expressCompany, productLink, senderTel, recipientTel, senderName, recipientName, senderAddress, recipientAddress, status from db.express e, db.courierExpress cE where e.expressNo = cE.expressNo and cE.courierNo = #{courierNo} and e.status = #{status}
select c.tel from courierExpress cE,courier c where cE.expressNo=#{expressNo} and c.courierNo=cE.courierNo
